categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kullen was a male Human sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War, when he was stationed at the estate of the Imperial-allied House Thul.

Kullen appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Imperial players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Kullen was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors.
